_sText:
Tier 7
Linear
3 Bonuses

Thanks to Spree, I began to experiment with making spinny styled stuff. When they made surf_strike b1, I got very interested in experimenting with super fast-paced type spins. This, along with me running surf_tronic, Spy Complex also making interesting spins, is how surf_blackheart was made.

The theme is almost entirely based off of the title, which is just a song by Carly Rae Jepsen. some other detailing aspects come from stuff like the flood from Halo and some other apocalyptic games/media.

note: the tier was decided by the testers, about 60-75% of the testers said it was tier 7 or tier 8, the rest said tier 6.
note2: displacement surf is allowed

server/zone configuration:

The map, b1 and b3 should have a dropzone start (meaning the zone hovers above the area you fall through, so you drop through it). b2 should be a regular zone being only above the start platform.

The trigger_multiple zones of the map are named:
mapstartzone
mapendzone
b1startzone
b1endzone
etc...
